title: UI Menu Sound FX Pack
description: UI Menu Sound FX Pack is a set of digital beeps, clicks, and pops created to enhance your game’s UI and bring the gamer experience to another level.
longDescription:
UI Menu Sound FX Pack is a set of digital beeps, clicks, and pops created to enhance your game’s UI and bring the gamer experience to another level.


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/ui-menu-demo-track-1


Are you a game developer? Wanting to add high quality sounds to your UI?


Discover:

-         high quality sounds created from award winning synths

-         A diversity of UI sounds from 6 categories including ‘Access Denied’, ‘Command accepted’, ‘Menu sounds’, and ‘Transitions’

-         370+ Sound files that you can import directly into your project


Find a complete breakdown of the assets list at the following link: http://bit.ly/UIMenuASSETLIST


***NOTE: UI MENU SOUND FX PACK IS INCLUDED IN THE SCI-FI UI SOUND PACK ***

The Sci-Fi UI Sound Pack can be found here: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/sci-fi-ui-sound-pack


Free pack samples here: http://bit.ly/UIMenuFREEPACK
technicalDetails:
Total Audio Files: 374

Total Cues: 374

Total Minutes of Audio: 5minutes 25 seconds

Format: 44.1 kHz & 16 bit

Does the audio Loop? No

Number of Sound FX: 374

Target Platform: All

Documentation Included: Asset list only (see above)

Important/Additional Notes: No
